Text:
function ERI_EP04_10()
    --.承-1【11月第3週】「伊草ミナトの拠り所」
    SaveData.Title = "伊草ミナトの拠り所"

    --//BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ After parting ways with Daria. My feet naturally headed toward the hospital where Marika-nee was hospitalized. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "It was Daria who was causing Marika-nee pain, wasn’t it?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I'm sorry for talking about Daria until now without realizing I was being deceived." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1091.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Because I easily trust people... I'm really, hopelessly stupid, aren’t I?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "At this rate, it’s no wonder I can’t protect Nee-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//CI：眠るマリカ 005
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI005a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)


    MSG([[ As expected, Marika-nee continued to sleep just as before. There was no way she could respond. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I wonder if I really can’t change. Am I someone who can’t protect anyone?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ But if I didn’t talk to Nee-san, my chest felt like it would burst. I simply couldn’t bear it. ]])

    MSG([[ Alone, as if practicing against the wall, I kept pouring out my weakness to Nee-san. ]])

    MSG([[ Endlessly. Endlessly……. ]])
    --//SE：引き戸の開閉音（すーっ）
PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
WAIT(500)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Then, suddenly, the hospital room door opened. ]])
    --//BU：アキラ（真剣・私服）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0600.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...I’ve been looking for you, stupid Mina-chin." ]])

    MSG([[ When I turned to look, Akira was standing there like a statue. Clearly in a bad mood. ]])

    MSG([[ I was thrown into confusion by the unexpected appearance. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A-Akira...? How did you find out I was here?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0601.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If Mina-chin didn’t come home to make my dinner, something must have happened." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0602.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The only place Mina-chin would go in a situation like that is to Mariccho. I called the hospital and hit the jackpot." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0603.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Making this socially awkward me make that phone call is a serious offense. Hurry up and come home to make some omelette rice." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "S-Sorry... I just got lost on what I’m supposed to do." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0604.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mi, Mina-chin...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Damn it. Seeing Akira's face and feeling relieved, tears welled up again. ]])

    MSG([[ Stop! Stop crying! Please stop! ]])

    MSG([[ I mustn’t worry Akira. As a guy, I have to reassure her! ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "N-Nothing! Don’t worry! I just cried a bit remembering a movie I saw today, it’s nothing serious!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0605.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You’re really bad at lying, huh?" ]])

    --//SE：抱き着く音（ﾎﾟｽｯ）
PLAY_SE("SEa026.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Akira gently wrapped her arms around me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A-Akira...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0606.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Punishment for lying. Stay hugged by me until I say it’s okay." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0607.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You came to see Mariccho on a night like this, so there’s no way nothing happened. Anyone can tell you must have been really shocked." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0608.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "And yet... you cling to your sister who can’t even speak instead of me nearby. Am I really that unreliable?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0609.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Is it that I can’t even listen to your weaknesses?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s grip tightened. Her body was slightly damp with sweat, a little cool. ]])

    MSG([[ She must have run here as fast as she could. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira, who hates going out, came all this way for me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’m sorry, Akira. Thank you... so much for coming." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Her kindness made me happy, and tears streamed down again. ]])

    MSG([[ But these tears were completely different from before. They didn’t feel unpleasant at all, but rather comforting. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0610.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’m just returning the favor for what Mina-chin did for me back then, so don’t worry about it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0611.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "All I can do for Mina-chin is be by your side. So I will never let go." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0612.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Because Mina-chin is an important person to me." ]])

    MSG([[ I remember saying something like that to Akira long ago. I never thought she’d remember. ]])

    MSG([[ Back then. And even now. Akira is someone I have to protect. ]])

    MSG([[ But now, I am supported and saved by Akira. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’ll explain everything properly later... but could I stay like this a little longer?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I want Akira to help me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0613.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Can’t be helped. You’ll just have to fall head over heels for my devilish embrace, muhehehe." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s cheerful laughter was so heartwarming, I burst out laughing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0614.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Why are you laughing now? That pisses me off, I’ll kill you with my deadly Devil Hand laugh attack." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hey! Stop! Don’t tickle my side! I—I’ll get you back!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI02ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0615.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Eek!? That’s cheating to fight back! You devil! Devil Hand<r=ブイ>V</r>!" ]])

    MSG([[ We started out hugging but before long, it turned into a tickle fight. This usual roughhousing felt more comforting than anything right now. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as Akira said, relying on Marika-nee was really stupid. ]])

    MSG([[ It will be a tough battle, but I’ll fight through it. Although I’m cynical and shy, I’ll fight alongside my cutest cousin in the world. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_11")
end
